publisher.publisher-name: U.S.-Japan Women's Center, Jōsai International Center for the Promotion of Art and Science and Purdue University

title-group.article-title: Rewriting Chekhov: Translation, Journalism, and Modern Literature in 1920s Korea

permissions.copyright-statement: © December 2008 JŌSAI INTERNATIONAL CENTER FOR THE PROMOTION OF ART AND SCIENCE, JŌSAI UNIVERISTY
